attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
New Charter for Adult Education

A Vision from Liverpool

This charter has been put together by a group of practitioners and students in Liverpool as a response to cuts in Adult Education funding.

Sign up to the charter today to register your support

We will use this strength of feeling to call on the government and other providers of Adult Education to re-build a provision for adults that has real meaning for people’s lives.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "We call for:Long term public funding that prioritises adults who benefited least from school; A return to the principles of Lifelong Learning; Rich and varied learning opportunities for everyone – irrespective of their age or employment status ; Equal status for all courses - accredited and non-accredited –skills, leisure, social and cultural ;Equal rights to funding and resources with a fair fee policy for all."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
